message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $180 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down a bit to $160. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $140, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me in the middle at $145?
